title: A very, very small graphical bug
body:
There is what looks like a single pixel missing on the right hand side bar, link to images for an explanation
http://oi58.tinypic.com/102uws6.jpg 
http://oi60.tinypic.com/j0w2nb.jpg

replies.body: This is a very serious issue. Unfortunately, the only way to fix it is to delete your monitor. This will make all pixels uniformly nonexistent.
My OCD has gone out of control!
